definition: to lower/to decrease/to reduce/to subtract/to diminish

to fall/to drop/to lag behind/to lose/to go missing/to reduce/fall (in prices)/to lose (value, weight etc)/to wag/to swing/to turn/to change/to exchange/to swap/to show off/to shed (hair)/(used after certain verbs to express completion, fulfillment, removal etc)

sentences.english: The placebo group only lost an average of 2 lbs.
Dr Hall's model predicts an average loss of just 11kg.
sentences.chinese: 而霍爾博士的模式預測的是，平均減掉11公斤。

sentences.english: Lose the elephant leg, the first thing to do is, often a bath.
sentences.chinese: 要減掉大象腿，首先要做的就是，勤洗澡。

sentences.english: I still have more pounds to drop, but I can't complain.
sentences.chinese: 雖然我還有很多肥肉要減掉，但我並沒有抱怨。

sentences.english: The Tea-bag Packing Machine model SD-DPC-81 have added automatic boxing device instead of envelope packing system.
sentences.chinese: 型包裝機減掉了外袋封裝機構，增加了自動入盒裝置。

sentences.english: Lost over 40 lbs since last year.
sentences.chinese: 從去年以來我減掉了40磅。

sentences.english: Subtracted from the budget on the part of the baseboard.
sentences.chinese: 就從預算中減掉踢腳線的部分。

sentences.english: Subtract the desire, and you can write without acquiring.
sentences.chinese: “減掉”這個慾望，你不要新的筆記本仍舊有的寫。

sentences.english: What's left is a pudgy belly that you do not have the motivation to lose.
sentences.chinese: 留下的只是大腹便便的你，而你沒有動力去減掉它。

sentences.english: If I could just lose 10 pounds I know I would feel better.
sentences.chinese: 如果我可以減掉10磅的體重，微遽感覺更好。

sentences.english: Doubling up, you could drop that pound in 21 hour-long sessions.
sentences.chinese: 合併一下，你可以在21個小時裏減掉一磅。

sentences.english: He's meant to lose at least one stone this summer.
sentences.chinese: 今年夏天，他打算減掉一石重呢。

sentences.english: If you want to lose those last few stubborn pounds, move.
sentences.chinese: 如果想減掉那幾磅頑固的贅肉，那就動起來吧。

sentences.english: Next up for Blaine, putting on some of the weight he’s lost.
sentences.chinese: 接下來布萊恩會做什麼，他要恢復這些天減掉的體重。

sentences.english: You can lose two or more pounds per week without diet or exercise.
sentences.chinese: 無需節食和鍛鍊，你可以每週減掉兩磅或更多。

sentences.english: Want to lose more or lose faster?
sentences.chinese: 想減掉更多或者減得更快嗎？

definition: to save food/to go on a diet
to put on weight/to get fat
to go on a hunger strike
original poster (in an online forum)/landlord of a building (traditional)
erhua variant of 寶貝|宝贝[bao3 bei4]
